mapper.update: update edu_schoolschedule set schoolid = #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stageid = #{stageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, session = #{session,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, schoolid, stageid, name, type, session, time, sortnum, createtime from edu_schoolschedule
select pkid, schoolid, stageid, name, type, session, time, sortnum, createtime from edu_schoolschedule WHERE schoolid=#{0} and stageid=#{1} and session=#{2} limit 1
